name: Unipi
body:
#### uniPi:  _use UNIFI SDK for UNIX and sun/oracle jre/jdk on ARM embedded platforms to run unifi's controller software, and other related functions._


***
`**UniPi**`
***
 
* install.sh -- build script to load Unifi controller onto raspi 
* postInstall.sh -- post install modifications to initialization 
* README.md -- this document
***

***
`**UNIFI KNOWLEDGE BASE**`
***

* UniFi-Layer-3-methods-for-UAP-adoption-and-management 
* UniFi-VLAN-switch-configuration 
* WirelessUplinkTopology
***

***
`**RFC's**`
***
 
* Rfc5415 - Control And Provisioning of Wireless Access Points (CAPWAP) Protocol Specification
* Rfc5417 - Control And Provisioning of Wireless Access Points (CAPWAP) 
* Dhcp-option60 - integration with dhcp for provisioning
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
